name: Remains (MatthewBazinet)
description:
A Retro-FPS set in a lost cult's hideout.

You found a hidden door in a subway. You went in and the door disappeared. Find your way out. 

You are expected to get lost. The level is small. Explore whenever you don't know what is going on.

Only a couple minutes long.

WASD Movement
Shift to Sprint
Left Click to Shoot

Flare Gun shots will deal damage over time.
